name: opentalk
description: OpenTalk is a self-hosted video conferencing solution built with privacy-first principles. It includes meeting rooms, screen sharing, chat, and customizable deployment via Docker and Kubernetes.

features.title: Video Conferencing
features.description: Host secure video meetings with HD quality, noise cancellation, and bandwidth optimization

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted solution ensuring complete control over meeting data and participant information

features.title: Chat Integration
features.description: Built-in text chat with file sharing, emoji reactions, and message history during meetings

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Create persistent virtual rooms with custom settings, access controls, and recurring schedules

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Record meetings locally with automatic transcription and searchable content indexing

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Join meetings from smartphones and tablets with full feature parity and optimized interfaces
